name: Équivalence des inspections sur pied et de certaines semences produites en Bolivie - Equivalence of field inspections and of certain seed produced in Bolivia - Gleichstellung von Feldbesichtigungen sowie von bestimmtem in Bolivien erzeugtem Saatgut -  - Veronika Vrecionová - Proposition de la Commission
title: Equivalence of field inspections carried out and equivalence of seed produced: period of application; in Bolivia on cereal and oil and fibre plant seed-producing crops, and of cereal seed and oil and fibre plant seed
